faculties_accepted: College of Design and Engineering (CDE or FoE)
Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences (FASS)
Yong Siew Toh Conservatory of Music (YSTCM)
module_restrictions: Limited undergraduate modules are taught in English. More master level modules are taught in English. NUS students need to meet the prerequisites of TUHH’s master level module.
visa_info: EU citizens and citizens from Australia, Canada, Honduras, Iceland, Israel, Japan, Korea, Liechtenstein, Monaco, New Zealand, Norway, San Marino, Switzerland, and the United States do not need a visa to enter Germany. Students from all other countries must apply for a Student Applicant's visa via the German diplomatic representation. All students are advised to open a German bank account and then apply for the necessary visa immediately upon receipt of the official offer letter/email from their host university. Some visa application processes could take up to 2 months to process.
accommodations_info: Student accommodation in Hamburg is extremely limited. Please apply as early as possible during the application period. Accommodation application deadline: Semester 1: 15 June, Semester 2: 15 December. For more information about accommodation, please refer to https://www.tuhh.de/alt/tuhh/international/incoming-international-students/accommodation-office.html
cost_of_living: The estimated monthly living expenses are as follows: Accommodation: €350 - €500, Food: €200, Insurance: €90, Others (Entertainment, clothes): €200. Monthly Estimate: €840 - €990.
